summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the condemnation and acquisition of Erskine Way; amending Sections 1, 2 and 5 of Ordinance No. 45322, and further amending said Ordinance by adding thereunto a section to be known as Section 1A; providing for the acquisition of certain lands, premises and other property in fee simple, for general municipal purposes; providing that the property so acquired for general municipal purposes, shall be paid for from the General Fund of the City of Seattle.
